inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes and using daily insulin therapy for at least one year
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diabetic ketoacidosis in the past 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hypoglycemic seizure or loss of consciousness in the past 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but this episode is not within the past 3 months. He does not have a history of hypoglycemic seizure or loss of consciousness.
